text: luk hla nxadam xey thæcring rea di hı lng ma kæ phwk cea læw sung kheruxng nunghm thi pkpid sing thi xan na laxay khxng phwk cea læa kheruxng nunghm thi hı khwam swyngam læa kheruxng nunghm hæng khwam yakerng nan khux sing thi di ying nanhæla khux swn hnung cak brrda xongkar khx ngxallxhˌ pheux wa khea hela nan ca di raluk
